version_description: Fix a crash reported by user when doing recognize on iPad device 64-bit with iOS 7

There’s a LOT new in this version for you to enjoy!

• Major UI Overhaul. Added a significant amount of new features that make the LEADTOOLS OCR app faster and even easier to use.
• Upgraded Recognition Speed: We've made tons of awesome updates to our recognition engine that allow for text recognition with superior accuracy at lightning speed!
• Document Export Capabilities: Added the ability to export your recognition results in various document formats such as PDF, Microsoft Word Doc, Text, Rich Text, & SVG.
• Updated App Icon. Redesigned for the latest iOS version.
• Overall App Enhancement: We re-wrote this app from scratch to provide the best possible user experience and to show developers more of LEADTOOLS OCR capabilities.

We love your feedback, please feel free to share it with us anytime at: comments@leadtools.com

• OCR improvements and bug fixes

We love your feedback, please feel free to share it with us anytime at: comments@leadtools.com

• Added a "Detect Graphics and Colors" OCR Setting
• Improved 3D Deskew ease of use
• Stability and speed improvements

We love your feedback, please feel free to share it with us anytime at: comments@leadtools.com

• Added a feature that allows you to copy the image from the viewer.

We love your feedback! Please feel free to share it with us anytime at: comments@leadtools.com

• Complete redesign of the entire user interface
• Added some additional options
• Fixes and speedups

We love your feedback! Please feel free to share it with us anytime at: comments@leadtools.com

• Improved the "Select Area" control for easier selection of specific areas of text
• Improved output quality
• General updates for the new iOS 10
• Fixed some bugs related to older iOS versions

We love your feedback! Please feel free to share it with us anytime at: comments@leadtools.com

• Improved the "Select Area" control for easier selection of specific areas of text
• Streamlined the top menu
• Speed improvements for text extraction
• Additional menu item for auto-rotating images

We love your feedback! Please feel free to share it with us anytime at: comments@leadtools.com

• Some of you liked the old Touch & Drag Select area mode and some requested a Selection Rectangle, so we've added the ability to choose between a Selection Rectangle or Touch & Drag to make everyone happy! :)
• Added an "Intelligent Select Area" option that allows you to select an area of an image that has both text and graphics and intelligently extract the text.
• Speed improvements, recognition enhancements, and bug fixes.

We love your feedback! Please feel free to share it with us anytime at: comments@leadtools.com

• Improved OCR recognition speed by 40%!
• Added the ability to edit the selection area after using "Touch and Drag" select area mode.
• Improved recognition results for images loaded from the photo library

We love your feedback! Please feel free to share it with us anytime at: comments@leadtools.com

• Added new text-to-speech option - look for the "Speak" button after you extract text!
• Text to Speech is available for playback in each supported language - English, Spanish, French, German, and Italian

What's New from version 5.5.0 & up:

• Improved OCR recognition speed by 40%!
• Added the ability to edit the selection area after using "Touch and Drag" select area mode.
• Improved recognition results for images loaded from the photo library

• Fixed issue in iOS 11 where images were not loading correctly
